name: Tanker_Melee.Spines
display_help: Spines protrude from your body and can deal damage in melee or at very short ranges. Spines are hollow and hold a neural toxin that deals additional Toxic damage and can Slow or Immobilize your enemies. The toxin is cumulative, and multiple hits will affect a target more strongly. Very few foes have resistance to Spine poison. Like all scrapper powers, all Spine attacks can sometimes land a critical hit for double damage.

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Spines.Barb_Swipe
powers.display_help: Melee, Light DMG(Lethal), DoT(Toxic), -SPD, -Recharge. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: -16.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 4s on target
-8.00% strength to recharge for 2s on target
-16.00% strength to jump height for 4s on target
3 ticks of 80.00% chance for 5.28 toxic damage over 2.1s on target after 0.5s delay

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Spines.Lunge
powers.display_help: You can lunge forward, stabbing and poisoning a foe with the large Spine on your arm. Lunge deals moderate damage. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: -16.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 6s on target
-8.00% strength to recharge for 4s on target
-16.00% strength to jump height for 6s on target
4 ticks of 80.00% chance for 5.28 toxic damage over 3.1s on target after 0.5s delay

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Spines.Spine_Burst
powers.display_help: You can fling dozens of Spines in all directions. These Spines only travel a short distance, but they can deal moderate damage and poison any target close to you. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info: -16.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 10s on target
-8.00% strength to recharge for 8s on target
-16.00% strength to jump height for 10s on target
4 ticks of 80.00% chance for 5.28 toxic damage over 3.1s on target after 0.5s delay

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Spines.Taunt
powers.display_help: Taunts a foe, and some nearby foes, to attack you. Useful for pulling villains off an ally who find themselves in over their head. Taunted foes tend to ignore other Heroes and focus on you for quite a while, so use this power cautiously. A To Hit check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -100.00% strength to range for 20s on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Spines.Ripper
powers.display_help: You can unleash a spectacular slashing maneuver that attacks all villains in a wide arc in front of you. Ripper deals massive damage and poisons multiple targets. It can even knock foes down. Spine poison Slows affected targets and deals additional Toxic damage. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 7 ft. radius 90° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: 60.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
60.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Spines.Build_Up
powers.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

display_info: 80.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Spines.Impale
powers.display_help: You can throw a single large Spine at a targeted foe. This Spine does only moderate damage, but carries a large amount of the Spine toxin. A successful attack can completely Immobilize most foes, as well as Slowing them and dealing Toxic poison damage. Impale can also bring down flying entities. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -24.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 15s on target
-24.00% strength to jump height for 15s on target
5 ticks of 80.00% chance for 5.28 toxic damage over 4.1s on target after 0.5s delay
-8.00% strength to recharge for 8s on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Spines.Quills
powers.display_help: While this power is active, you will constantly fire dozens of Spines in all directions. These Spines do minor damage, but can poison all foes in close range. Spine poison Slows affected foes. Note that Quills is unaffected by Radius changes. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow

display_info: -8.00% strength to recharge for 3s on target

-16.00% strength to jump height for 3s on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Spines.Throw_Spines
powers.display_help: You can throw dozens of Spines in a wide cone in front of you, impaling foes caught within the range. Spine throwing deals moderate damage, and poisons any targets it hits. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes. Note that Throw Spines is unaffected by Arc changes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
